name: Live Visitor Counter
author: Adam Z

sections.description:
What Makes this Counter Unique from others?

  • Easy to install
  • Easy to use
  • Beautifully designed counters
  • Extremely lightweight
  • Free Forever

FEATURES INCLUDE:

The free Live Visitor Counter widget includes the following features:

  • Live visitors
  • Today’s visitors
  • Total visitors
  • Dark Mode
  • Unique Visitor Per Session
  • Transfer your numbers from previous counters
  • Lighter and faster
  • Transparent background Style

The design is minimalistic and simple and works with all kind of website styles.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-visitors-widget directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. You can find the installed plugin under Widgets.
sections.changelog:
2.2 (2023-06-20):

  • Tested with latest WP version
  • Little optimizations

2.1 (2022-02-11):

  • Fixed compatibility with latest jQuery
  • Fixed visitors counting. for now session time is one day
  • Little optimizations
  • Added the ability to translate the widget
  • Daily reset time has been changed to WordPress local time

2.0 (2019-10-23):

  • Dark mode
  • Unique visitor per session
  • Transfer your numbers from previous counters
  • Lighter and faster
  • Transparent background Style

1.0 (2019-02-23):

  • Initial Release

short_description: Wordpress Live Visitor Counter allows you to display how many times a page has been viewed with this simple, fast and easy to use the plugin.
